statements: SELECT * FROM student_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM student_demographics WHERE age > 20;
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM student_demographics WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM student_demographics ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name, enrollment_status FROM student_demographics WHERE enrollment_status='Enrolled';
SELECT * FROM student_demographics WHERE age > 20 ORDER BY last_name DESC, first_name ASC
SELECT first_name, age FROM student_demographics WHERE gender = 'Male'
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM student_demographics WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active'
SELECT count(*) AS total_students FROM student_demographics
SELECT * FROM student_demographics WHERE last_name LIKE 'S%'
SELECT * FROM student_demographics WHERE student_gender = 'Female';
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM student_demographics ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM student_demographics WHERE student_age < 20;
SELECT * FROM enrollment_numbers WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT program_name, enrollment_date FROM enrollment_numbers ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM student_demographics WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_gender FROM student_demographics WHERE student_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date, program_name FROM enrollment_numbers WHERE enrollment_status = 'Active';
SELECT student_name, enrollment_date, program_name FROM student_demographics D JOIN enrollment_numbers E ON D.student_id = E.student_id WHERE D.student_age < 30 ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM student_demographics D LEFT JOIN enrollment_numbers E ON D.student_id = E.student_id WHERE E.program_name LIKE '%Science%' AND E.enrollment_status = 'Active' ORDER BY D.student_age DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM student_demographics;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, gender FROM student_demographics;
SELECT course_name, instructor_name FROM course_details;
SELECT enrollment_id, enrollment_date, course_id FROM enrollment_numbers;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name, credit_hours FROM student_demographics JOIN enrollment_numbers ON student_demographics.student_id = enrollment_numbers.student_id JOIN course_details ON enrollment_numbers.course_id = course_details.course_id;
SELECT first_name, last_name, birthdate FROM student_demographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM enrollment_numbers WHERE enrollment_date >= '2021-01-01' AND enrollment_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT course_name, instructor_name, credit_hours FROM course_details ORDER BY credit_hours DESC;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, course_name FROM student_demographics JOIN enrollment_numbers ON student_demographics.student_id = enrollment_numbers.student_id JOIN course_details ON enrollment_numbers.course_id = course_details.course_id;

SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, enrollment_date, course_name FROM student_demographics JOIN enrollment_numbers ON student_demographics.student_id = enrollment_numbers.student_id JOIN course_details ON enrollment_numbers.course_id = course_details.course_id ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'Enrolled';
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits > 3;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id FROM enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, gender, enrollment_status FROM students WHERE gender = 'M';
SELECT student_name, date_of_birth FROM students ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id;
SELECT student_name, ethnicity, family_income FROM students JOIN demographics ON students.student_id = demographics.student_id WHERE family_income > 50000;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor FROM Courses;
SELECT * FROM Enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM Enrollments WHERE student_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Students
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name FROM Students WHERE gender='Male'
SELECT course_name, course_description, instructor FROM Courses WHERE course_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, birthdate FROM Students ORDER BY birthdate DESC
SELECT department_name, department_head FROM Departments INNER JOIN Department_Courses ON Departments.department_id = Department_Courses.department_id
